body: Planar adaptation grants you immunity to the harmful environmental effects of a particular plane of existence, including such hazards as toxicity, extreme temperatures, and lack of air. Additionally, you gain energy resistance 20 to a single energy type prevalent on that plane (choose one if more than one type is equally prevalent). Planar adaptation has no effect when cast upon your native plane.
description: Resist harmful effects of other plane.
level_text: Alchemist: 5; Arcanist: 5; Cleric: 4; Elementalist Wizard: 5; Investigator: 5; Oracle: 4; Sorcerer: 5; Summoner: 5; Warpriest: 4; Wizard: 5
name: Planar Adaptation
